title: Authors and Citation
text: Wang Z (2022). ravemanager: Manage 'RAVE' Packages. R package version 1.0.6, https://dipterix.org/ravemanager/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ravemanager: Manage 'RAVE' Packages},   author = {Zhengjia Wang},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.0.6},   url = {https://dipterix.org/ravemanager/}, }

title: Manage RAVE Packages
text: Please make sure R installed first! Open R application. Copy paste following command “R” (“RStudio”) console: Install system libraries (added) Install RAVE Enter following command R console:

title: Manage RAVE Packages
text: check RAVE dependencies latest version, use following R command

title: Install or upgrade 'RAVE' — RAVE-install
text: Installs newest version 'RAVE' dependence packages; executes scripts finalize installation update configuration files.

title: Install or upgrade 'RAVE' — RAVE-install
code: add_shortcuts()  finalize_installation(   packages = NULL,   upgrade = c("config-only", "ask", "always", "never", "data-only"),   async = FALSE,   ... )  install(   nightly = FALSE,   upgrade_manager = FALSE,   finalize = TRUE,   force = FALSE,   ... )  update_rave(   nightly = FALSE,   upgrade_manager = FALSE,   finalize = TRUE,   force = FALSE,   ... )  upgrade_installer()

title: Install or upgrade 'RAVE' — RAVE-install
text: packages packages run finalizing installation scripts upgrade upgrade type async whether execute finalizing installation scripts processes ... passed internal functions, useful arguments include use_rspm whether use 'RSPM' 'Ubuntu' (enabled default) nightly whether install nightly build upgrade_manager whether upgrade installer (ravemanager) updating packages finalize whether run finalizing installation scripts force whether force updating packages even installed latest versions

title: Run tutorials — run_tutorials
text: topic integers topic launch, leave blank, 'RAVE' ask select topic ... parameters pass shiny::runApp()

title: Get system requirements for 'RAVE' — system_requirements
text: os, os_release operating system release version, see https://github.com/rstudio/r-system-requirements#operating-systems curl location curl binary system ... reserved future use

title: Get system requirements for 'RAVE' — system_requirements
code: # Please check your operating system & version!!!  # =============== On Ubuntu Linux ===============  # Ubuntu 20 ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "20") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-20 #> apt-get install -y make #> apt-get install -y cmake #> apt-get install -y libicu-dev #> apt-get install -y pandoc #> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev #> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev #> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev #> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev #> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev #> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev #> apt-get install -y libpng-dev #> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev #> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev #> apt-get install -y git #> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev #> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev #> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev #> apt-get install -y libglpk-dev #> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev #> apt-get install -y libzmq3-dev #> apt-get install -y python3  # Ubuntu 18 ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "18") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-18 #> apt-get install -y software-properties-common #> add-apt-repository -y ppa:cran/libgit2 #> apt-get update #> apt-get install -y make #> apt-get install -y cmake #> apt-get install -y libicu-dev #> apt-get install -y pandoc #> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev #> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev #> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev #> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev #> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev #> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev #> apt-get install -y libpng-dev #> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev #> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev #> apt-get install -y git #> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev #> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev #> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev #> apt-get install -y libglpk-dev #> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev #> apt-get install -y libzmq3-dev #> apt-get install -y python3  # Ubuntu 16 ravemanager::system_requirements("ubuntu", "16") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under ubuntu-16 #> apt-get install -y software-properties-common #> add-apt-repository -y ppa:cran/libgit2 #> apt-get update #> apt-get install -y make #> apt-get install -y cmake #> apt-get install -y libicu-dev #> apt-get install -y pandoc #> apt-get install -y zlib1g-dev #> apt-get install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libssl-dev #> apt-get install -y libfontconfig1-dev #> apt-get install -y libfreetype6-dev #> apt-get install -y libfribidi-dev #> apt-get install -y libharfbuzz-dev #> apt-get install -y libjpeg-dev #> apt-get install -y libpng-dev #> apt-get install -y libtiff-dev #> apt-get install -y libxml2-dev #> apt-get install -y git #> apt-get install -y libgit2-dev #> apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev #> apt-get install -y libhdf5-dev #> apt-get install -y libglpk-dev #> apt-get install -y libgmp3-dev #> apt-get install -y libzmq3-dev #> apt-get install -y python3  # =============== On Red Hat Enterprise Linux ===============  # Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 ravemanager::system_requirements("redhat", "8") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under redhat-8 #> subscription-manager repos --enable codeready-builder-for-rhel-8-x86_64-rpms #> dnf install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm #> dnf install -y make #> dnf install -y cmake #> dnf install -y libicu-devel #> dnf install -y zlib-devel #> dnf install -y libcurl-devel #> dnf install -y openssl-devel #> dnf install -y fontconfig-devel #> dnf install -y freetype-devel #> dnf install -y fribidi-devel #> dnf install -y harfbuzz-devel #> dnf install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel #> dnf install -y libpng-devel #> dnf install -y libtiff-devel #> dnf install -y libxml2-devel #> dnf install -y git #> dnf install -y libgit2-devel #> dnf install -y fftw-devel #> dnf install -y hdf5-devel #> dnf install -y glpk-devel #> dnf install -y gmp-devel #> dnf install -y zeromq-devel #> dnf install -y python2  # Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 ravemanager::system_requirements("redhat", "7") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under redhat-7 #> rpm -q epel-release || yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm #> yum install -y make #> yum install -y cmake #> yum install -y libicu-devel #> yum install -y pandoc #> yum install -y zlib-devel #> yum install -y libcurl-devel #> yum install -y openssl-devel #> yum install -y fontconfig-devel #> yum install -y freetype-devel #> yum install -y fribidi-devel #> yum install -y harfbuzz-devel #> yum install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel #> yum install -y libpng-devel #> yum install -y libtiff-devel #> yum install -y libxml2-devel #> yum install -y git #> yum install -y libgit2-devel #> yum install -y fftw-devel #> yum install -y hdf5-devel #> yum install -y glpk-devel #> yum install -y gmp-devel #> yum install -y zeromq-devel #> yum install -y python  # =============== On CentOS ===============  # Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 ravemanager::system_requirements("centos", "8") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under centos-8 #> dnf install -y dnf-plugins-core #> dnf config-manager --set-enabled powertools #> dnf install -y epel-release #> dnf install -y make #> dnf install -y cmake #> dnf install -y libicu-devel #> dnf install -y pandoc #> dnf install -y zlib-devel #> dnf install -y libcurl-devel #> dnf install -y openssl-devel #> dnf install -y fontconfig-devel #> dnf install -y freetype-devel #> dnf install -y fribidi-devel #> dnf install -y harfbuzz-devel #> dnf install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel #> dnf install -y libpng-devel #> dnf install -y libtiff-devel #> dnf install -y libxml2-devel #> dnf install -y git #> dnf install -y libgit2-devel #> dnf install -y fftw-devel #> dnf install -y hdf5-devel #> dnf install -y glpk-devel #> dnf install -y gmp-devel #> dnf install -y zeromq-devel #> dnf install -y python2  # Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 ravemanager::system_requirements("centos", "7") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under centos-7 #> yum install -y epel-release #> yum install -y make #> yum install -y cmake #> yum install -y libicu-devel #> yum install -y pandoc #> yum install -y zlib-devel #> yum install -y libcurl-devel #> yum install -y openssl-devel #> yum install -y fontconfig-devel #> yum install -y freetype-devel #> yum install -y fribidi-devel #> yum install -y harfbuzz-devel #> yum install -y libjpeg-turbo-devel #> yum install -y libpng-devel #> yum install -y libtiff-devel #> yum install -y libxml2-devel #> yum install -y git #> yum install -y libgit2-devel #> yum install -y fftw-devel #> yum install -y hdf5-devel #> yum install -y glpk-devel #> yum install -y gmp-devel #> yum install -y zeromq-devel #> yum install -y python  # =============== On OpenSUSE ===============  # openSUSE 42.3 ravemanager::system_requirements("opensuse", "42") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under opensuse-42 #> zypper install -y make #> zypper install -y cmake #> zypper install -y libicu-devel #> zypper install -y pandoc #> zypper install -y zlib-devel #> zypper install -y libcurl-devel #> zypper install -y libopenssl-devel #> zypper install -y fontconfig-devel #> zypper install -y freetype2-devel #> zypper install -y fribidi-devel #> zypper install -y harfbuzz-devel #> zypper install -y libjpeg8-devel #> zypper install -y libpng16-compat-devel #> zypper install -y libtiff-devel #> zypper install -y libxml2-devel #> zypper install -y git #> zypper install -y libgit2-devel #> zypper install -y fftw3-devel #> zypper install -y hdf5-devel #> zypper install -y gmp-devel #> zypper install -y zeromq-devel #> zypper install -y python  # =============== On SUSE Linux Enterprise ===============  # SUSE Linux Enterprise 12.3 ravemanager::system_requirements("sle", "12") #> # Please consider the following system libraries under sle-12 #> zypper install -y make #> zypper install -y cmake #> zypper install -y libicu-devel #> zypper install -y zlib-devel #> zypper install -y libcurl-devel #> zypper install -y libopenssl-devel #> zypper install -y fontconfig-devel #> zypper install -y freetype2-devel #> zypper install -y libjpeg8-devel #> zypper install -y libpng16-compat-devel #> zypper install -y libtiff-devel #> zypper install -y libxml2-devel #> zypper install -y git #> zypper install -y libgit2-24 #> zypper install -y fftw3-devel #> zypper install -y hdf5-devel #> zypper install -y gmp-devel #> zypper install -y zeromq-devel #> zypper install -y python
